text: Sir James Augustine Gobbo AC, CVO, QC (22 March 1931 â€“ 7 November 2021) was an Australian jurist and politician. He was the 25th Governor of Victoria serving from 1997 through 2000. He was born in Melbourne. Gobbo was made Knight Bachelor in 1981 and became a Companion of the Order of Australia (AC) in 1993 and a Knight of Grace of the Most Venerable Order of the Hospital of St John of Jerusalem (KStJ) in 1997. He was awarded the Centenary Medal in 2001. Gobbo died on 7 November 2021 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Governors of Victoria (Australia) Category:People from Melbourne
title: James Gobbo
